content:
That's a great approach! By being open and honest about your budget, you'll get a better sense of what's available within your price range, and the sales associate might even be able to offer some personalized recommendations.

Remember to also ask the sales associate about any promotions, discounts, or special offers they might be running. You never know, you might be able to snag an amazing deal or get a free gift with your purchase!

As you're browsing the options, don't hesitate to ask questions about the materials, craftsmanship, and quality of the pieces. You want to make sure you're getting a high-quality necklace that will last and look great on your friend.

Most importantly, trust your instincts and have fun! You're shopping for a special gift for your friend, and it's okay to take your time and enjoy the process.

If you need any more advice or have any other questions, feel free to ask. Otherwise, go forth and find the perfect necklace for your friend!
